Synopsis: Retrieves an item from the OpenAI Assistant.
Description: The Get-OAIAssistantItem function retrieves an item from the OpenAI Assistant based on the specified AssistantId.

Examples.Title: EXAMPLE 1
Examples.Code:
Get-OAIAssistantItem -AssistantId "12345678"
This example retrieves an item from the OpenAI Assistant with the ID "12345678".
